ValidationRule.description: SF-130 This validation ensures that phonenumbers are entered in a valid format according to DIN5008. They should always start with a '+' followed by a country code and the phonenumber. They should not include any letters or special characters.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid phone number, starting with a plus sign, followed by a country code. Do not include letters or special characters, use at least 10 and max. 20 characters. Valid example: +49123456789
